item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Yoga and Qigong Online Course - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor to join our team and help us create a high-quality online course in yoga and qigong. As the video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing the footage captured during our yoga and qigong sessions, we will provide multiple camera angles. Your main tasks will include cutting and arranging clips, adding transitions and effects, matching audio files, optimizing audio quality, and ensuring a smooth flow of content. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their video editing skills. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to meet deadlines are also important.
Here are the instructions of how to edit these videos.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XBpjFxVRZT_Up7OaYUSLVKmKMB8Bhl8f/view?usp=sharing
If you have experience with Ai editing software that is a plus.


Budget: $800
Posted On: June 26, 2024 08:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Education, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Education, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: Vietnam
click to apply

item.title: Loop Video Creation 30 seconds length. High quality resolution. AI is allowed. - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a skilled professional who can create a loop video from a single picture. The loop should seamlessly transition from the end back to the beginning, creating a continuous loop effect. The final video should be of high quality and visually appealing. The project requires expertise in video editing and animation.

AI is allowed. Use creative input and prompt to elevate the personality of the pictures and include interesting backgrounds to the main characterrs.

Attention to detail is essential to ensure a smooth and flawless loop. The candidate should also have experience in using video editing software and possess a good eye for visual composition.

See references below:
1. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lTRiuFIWV54
2. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BKMJKqQgR48
3. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bv9uk_5znBY

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 26, 2024 07:40 UTC
Category: AI Video Generation & Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Photo Slideshow, Video Production, Music Video, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Photo Slideshow, Video Production, Music Video, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Costa Rica

item.title: Experienced video editor of french weddings to edit a 3 min teaser and a 25 min chronological video. - Upwork
item.description:
Hi :)

I'm looking for a video editor for weddings videos, the weddings are going to be in french and I would like someone that works with Davinci Resolve or FCP X.

Here is the job details :
- I will provide the raw footages to cull (around 150-200 GB to download) and music options
- I need a dynamic and cinematic 3 minute teaser
- I need you to edit the 25 minutes long video.

⚠️ The 25 minutes video need to be edited in a linear, chronological fashion, with no mixing of the day (meaning you use the files in alphabetical order, you don't mix the dance with the ceremony for examples) if you don't do that, if you mix everything up I will not pay you ! ⚠️

Here is my website for inspiration: https://aigal.ch

Please be aware that your are not able to publish the videos on your own platforms except if I gave the authorization.

Only contact me if you are working with Davinci Resolve or FCP X please :)

Let me know if you have any question :)
Best,

Emeric

Budget: $1,200
Posted On: June 26, 2024 07:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Wedding & Event Video, Color Grading, DaVinci Resolve, Final Cut Pro, French
Skills: Wedding & Event Video, Color Grading, DaVinci Resolve, Final Cut Pro, French
Country: Switzerland
click to apply

item.title: Product Review Video Creator (Amazon Video) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I am Lradon from Andvids.We are a video production agency from China assisting our clients in finding  content creators to produce unboxing videos. You can not only get free products(beauty,household,outdoor products,children's and pets' toys etc.), but also commissions by doing this in your free time.

Here are some requirements for the shoot:
1. The length of the video is 1-3 minutes, of which 30% of the time is used for explanation, and 70% of the time is used to show the use scenario of the product
2. Shoot in landscape mode (16:9) ，your face need to be shown in video
3. A clean, bright shooting environment
4. Able to introduce products in fluent and clear English
5. Introduce the selling points and functions of the product, and use it in multiple scenarios.
6. Don't mention price, discount
7. In case of emergency, illness, move or vacation, please inform us in advance.
Do not show QR codes of packaging or products in the video, and do not mention personal information

About project time and delivery method
Please complete the shooting and edit within three days after receiving the product.
And name the video in this format: order number + product name + your name, and put the video Upload it to Google Drive, set the link permission to open and send it to me.
I will pay you after I review it.

Most importantly, we need the original video.
About copyright: After you agree to send the video to us, we have the right to use your likeness for promotional purposes, including but not limited to uploading the video to Amazon

Special case treatment：
  However, if you cannot complete the shooting on time after receiving the product, lose contact, do not shoot, you will be responsible for this, the solution is as follows (choose one):
1. Pay for the product.
2. Forward the product to the new address and bear the shipping cost.

Long-term cooperation：
  The first three videos are the experimental list.Of course I'll still give you a commission.
   After that, if the video effect is good and the communication between the two parties is smooth, long-term cooperation can be considered.

If you are interested in this job,feel free to contact me and please send me an introduction video or anything you have shot recently.Look forward to receiving your applications.Thank you!


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 26, 2024 07:24 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: China
click to apply

item.title: Investor Presentation Design and Video Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented freelancer to enhance our investor presentation and create a teaser as well as a 45-90 second video. The goal is to make our presentation more visually compelling and engaging, capturing the attention of potential investors. The freelancer should have expertise in presentation design and video editing, with a keen eye for aesthetics and storytelling. They should be able to bring our ideas to life and create a visually stunning and impactful presentation. Key skills needed for this project include:

- Presentation design
- Graphic design
- Video editing
- Motion graphics
- Storyboarding

If you have a creative flair and can deliver high-quality visuals and videos that effectively convey our message, we would love to hear from you.

I will provide:

Slides to be updated (12/13) via canva or ppt
Some visuals to be incorporated into video in addition to the slides - the video should be basically the presentation but slicker
I will provide the bullets for the teaser

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 07:24 UTC
Category: Presentation Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Presentation Design, Adobe Illustrator, Microsoft PowerPoint, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Graphic Design, Presentation Design, Adobe Illustrator, Microsoft PowerPoint, Adobe Photoshop
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply
